snippet: SAFT--Marcia B.,passed away peacefully on February 19, 2016. Marcia is survived by her loving family; husband Stephen Saft, children Jamie and Vanessa, Laurie and Dan, Lissy and Charlie, seven wonderful grandchildren, and sister Nancy Rothman. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SAFT--Marcia B.,passed away peacefully on February 19, 2016. Marcia is survived by her loving family; husband Stephen Saft, children Jamie and Vanessa, Laurie and Dan, Lissy and Charlie, seven wonderful grandchildren, and sister Nancy Rothman. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SAFT, MARCIA B.
